messages.title: The Liberal Democrat plan
messages.content: Keep Scotland in the UK and stop another divisive independence referendum. Oppose the Conservatives' extreme hard Brexit. Invest in Scottish education and mental health.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Oppose the Conservatives' extreme hard Brexit.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Invest in Scottish education and mental health
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Invest in Scottish education and mental health.

issues.brexitEurope: Oppose the Conservatives' extreme hard Brexit.
issues.governance: Keep Scotland in the UK and stop another divisive independence referendum.
issues.government: The SNP is too busy with independence referendums to actually govern.

quotes.text: The SNP is too busy with independence referendums to actually govern.
